course_description: This course covers the statistical theory that underlies thermodynamics, and how that statistical theory can be applied in simulating of systems of molecules at thermal equilibrium. Through computer simulation exercises, students will gain basic skills in using molecular simulation software.
schedule_location: MW 11:30am-12:45pm in Emerson Chemistry Bldg. E363
sections: Class Nbr: 4025, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: R. Ribeiro, Status: Open
